name: Belleville, the new Montmartre
description:
This is Paris' most contemporary neighborhood, filled with street artists, young families and Parisians watching people.
Belleville is a complex and joyful artistic, political and cosmopolitan bric-à-brac that we, at Hidden Paris, are in love with! And we know it like the back of our hand: the tiny alleys and charming gardens, its intense history and most importantly its people and their stories.
